flawed_nl_solution:
When John gives his sister 1/4 of his money, he parts with 1/4*100 = <<1/4*100=400/1>>400/1 dollars
Johns remains with 100-400/1 = <<100-400/1=-300>>-300 dollars.
When he buys groceries worth $40, he remains with -300-40 = <<-300-40=-340>>-340 dollars
#### -340

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 400/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
